snippet: The company said it would stop the trial of a potential treatment after at least one patient had heart failure.
abstract: Bristol-Myers Squibb says it will stop the trial of a potential hepatitis C treatment after at least one patient had heart failure.
lead_paragraph: The company said it would stop the trial of a potential treatment after at least one patient had heart failure.

headline.seo: Bristol-Myers to Suspend Hepatitis C Drug Study
headline.main: Bristol-Myers to Suspend a Drug Study
headline.print_headline: Bristol-Myers To Suspend A Drug Study
